edu.uml.cs.isense.credentials
Class ClassroomMode

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      edu.uml.cs.isense.credentials.ClassroomMode

public class ClassroomMode
extends Activity

This dialog is used specifically for applications that want to allow or disallow the use of user account names for the EnterName dialog.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String PREFS_BOOLEAN_CLASSROOM_MODE
          SharedPrefences key that the EnterName class uses to determine whether or not to allow users to use their account name as a default.
static java.lang.String PREFS_KEY_CLASSROOM_MODE
          SharedPreferences key that decides whether or not the classroom checkbox is enabled.
